#summary Describes plugin installation

= Plugin installation =

Download the latest version of the plugin matching your current version of OpenX from http://code.google.com/p/openx-banner-creator/downloads/list

 * Log into OpenX as an admin
 * Switch to Administrator account
 * Go to Configuration tab
 * Click on Plugins in the menu on the left

Check the list of plugins and make sure *openXZetaPrints* plugin is not installed

Uninstall it if it is

 * Choose the downloaded plugin (a zip file) and click Install.
 * Scroll down the list to and check if openXZetaPrints plugin is installed
